name: Dinobeemon
effect: ＜DNA Digivolution: 0 from green Lv.4 + blue Lv.4＞ Digivolve unsuspended with the 2 specified Digimon stacked on top of each other. [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. When DNA digivolving, that Digimon doesn't unsuspend during its owner's next unsuspend phase.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] This Digimon gets +1000 DP for each of its colors.
